title: Angular 101
description: I presented at the NOVA MEAN Meetup and explained the basics of AngularJS through a presentation and live-coding section. The slides can be found at https://slides.com/ryantucker/angular-101.

title: Introduction to ExpressJS
description: I gave a quick, beginner's level talk about ExpressJS at the NOVA MEAN Meetup. The slides can be found at https://slides.com/ryantucker/express-js.

title: Angular 2: An Introduction
description: Shortly after the initial release of Angular 2, I presented an overview of the upcoming changes to the Angular framework at the NoVA Angular Meetup.

title: AngularJS Style Guides
description: I presented this lightning talk at the NoVA Angular Meetup. I explained the importance of style guides and how to go about creating one.

title: AngularJS and Socket.IO
description: In this talk, I explained how to combine the Socket.IO WebSocket library with AngularJS at the NoVA Angular Meetup.
